name: healing_id
description: Unique identifier for the healing event

name: healing_type
description: Type of healing action: batch_cleanup, retry, fallback, circuit_breaker_reset, etc.

name: trigger_reason
description: Root cause that triggered healing (e.g., 'Batch stalled at 87% for 15+ minutes')

name: action_taken
description: Specific action performed (e.g., 'Force completed batch batch_2026-02-05_xyz')

name: before_state
description: JSON string of state before healing

name: after_state
description: JSON string of state after healing
